parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**.

parameters.name: IncidentTime
parameters.description: The timestamp of the detection. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request. The value of this parameter is specified by the system.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the vertex. Set the value to **SAS_INCIDENT**.

parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: Vertex ID, which can be obtained from the AlarmUniqueInfo in the response of the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) interface.
